text: 7:52 2 Eghaghaniba 36:16; Matyu 21:35; 23:31; 1 Tesalonika 2:15Ian inazir afeziaba Godɨn akam inigha izir gumaziba, osɨmtɨziba bar me garɨki. Ezɨ me fomɨra Godɨn damazimɨn derazir gumazimɨn izirimɨn gun mɨgeima, ian inazir afeziaba me mɨsozi me ariaghire. Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn ia a inigha gumazir kurabar dafaribagh atɨgha, a mɨsoghezɨ an areme.
